      • isTermHarvestingAvailable

        public boolean isTermHarvestingAvailable()
        Specified by:
        isTermHarvestingAvailable in interface RuleSetCapabilities
        Returns:
        true, if term harvesting is available for this RuleSet.
        Note: You also have to check Privileges.hasRunTermHarvesting().

      • isUseHardExclusion

        public boolean isUseHardExclusion()
        Specified by:
        isUseHardExclusion in interface RuleSetCapabilities
        Returns:
        true, if you should use hard exclusion. In this case you should use ControlCharacter.EMPTY_ELEMENT. If false, you should mark excluded parts by ControlCharacter.SKIPPED_ELEMENT_START and ControlCharacter.SKIPPED_ELEMENT_END.
